biotools.summary: To understand the biological meaning of a cluster, the user usually has to sift through many textual annotations that are associated with biological entities. This Cytoscape plugin generates a visual summary of these annotations by displaying them as a tag cloud, where more frequent words are displayed using a larger font size. Word co-occurrence in a phrase can be visualized by arranging words in clusters or as a network.

bioschemas.name: WordCloud Cytoscape Plugin
